pkgmetadata.longdescription: Transformation-Based Regression under Dependent Truncation // A latent, quasi-independent truncation time is assumed to be linked with the observed dependent truncation time, the event time, and an unknown transformation parameter via a structural transformation model. The transformation parameter is chosen to minimize the conditional Kendall's tau (Martin and Betensky, 2005) doi:10.1198/016214504000001538 or the regression coefficient estimates (Jones and Crowley, 1992) doi:10.2307/2336782. The marginal distribution for the truncation time and the event time are completely left unspecified. The methodology is applied to survival curve estimation and regression analysis.
